title: The Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Clay and Buck recap their Independence Day weekend. Clay went to a baseball game in Atlanta. Buck enjoyed a more open NYC. Mask insanity still the norm on airplanes. Biden eats more ice cream. NPR and Rep. Cori Bush aren't fans of Fourth of July and freedom. New York Times says American flag is a symbol of division. C&B take calls from patriotic Americans.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
